description.heading: The card heading
description.subHeading: A subheading below the heading, explaining more stuff.
description.meta: Small text below title, in meta style.
description.buttons: Array with buttons that has parameters like href, text and attributeList.
description.collapsible: If the content should be collapsible.
description.linkText: The text of the link, if not set, the link will not be displayed.
description.dateBadge: Display date as a badge. Requires image to be set.
description.hasPlaceholder: If the card should have a placeholder, if the image is missing.
description.icon: An array with the same specification as the icon component
description.iconBackgroundColor: The background color of the icon
description.color: The background color of the image.
description.metaFirst: If the meta should be displayed before the heading.
description.headingAboveImage: If the headings should be displayed above the image.
